About the Conference

8th International Conference on Pharmaceutical, Nutraceutical, and Cosmeceutical Sciences (IPNaCS) and 11th International Postgraduate Conference on Pharmaceutical Sciences (IPoPS)

An international scientific meeting bringing together researchers, academics, industry professionals, and postgraduate scholars to discuss digital transformation across pharmaceutical and related sciences.

Conference Theme and Objectives

Connected Innovation: Digital Transformation in Wellness, Longevity and Therapy

The conference promotes high-quality research exchange on digital transformation in pharmacology, pharmacy, nutraceutical science, cosmetic science, and related healthcare disciplines.

Who Should Attend

  • Academic researchers and postgraduate scholars
  • Pharmacists, clinicians, and health professionals
  • Industry innovators and R&D teams
  • Policy, regulatory, and ethics stakeholders

IPNACS–IPOPS 2026

An international academic conference bringing together scholars, researchers and practitioners in pharmaceutical sciences and innovation.

Organizer

Faculty of Pharmacy

Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM)

Shah Alam, Malaysia
